comment.body: @ssdifnskdjfnsdjk@zeroid.bit: Just try to join my Hub :D

@ssdifnskdjfnsdjk@zeroid.bit: sure, let me share you the folder, i will upload it to gg drive, you must edit 2 files, the first one is content.json in /{your address}, and the second one is the content.json in /data/users/
and then you sign these 2 files, and publish the site

the steps is like this: 1. create new site, 2. copy files into /{new site address}, 3. edit the content.json in /{site address} and /data/users/content.json if it does not in /data/users/content.json just create that file. Update the file with your site address, your "sign"
@ssdifnskdjfnsdjk@zeroid.bit: ya, i have not cloned it, I created new site, and just copy the content.json and edit it, the keyword i think is type: zerome merge
@ssdifnskdjfnsdjk@zeroid.bit: BTW, do you have skype or anything like that, it will be easy to discuss there, easy to keep track
